entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then rain showers and flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
